title: Singing
description: When singing, I know that every pitch and note matters. The same is true in my work. Every pixel counts, every interaction aligns with a harmonious experience. I design interfaces with passion, attention to detail and an ear always tuned to the user's needs.

title: Moving
description: Whether it's the gym or dancing in the living room, moving is part of my weeks. I feel like each project is a choreography that offers a fluid and dynamic experience. From the first sketches to the final prototypes, I work with the same energy and precision that I put into every workout and dance.

title: Reading
description: I became a passionate reader after falling under the spell of a good story. Since then, I build visual narratives that guide the user through an immersive and meaningful experience. Every screen is a page and every interaction keeps the user engaged and satisfied.

title: People
description: Spending time with friends and family is one of my main sources of inspiration. Human connections and shared experiences fuel my empathy, communication, and collaboration; key elements in creating interfaces that foster meaningful connections for all users.
